overview:
Mark Jackson was most recently Senior Director of Engineering for Macrovisionâ€™s Research and Development department in the UK where he was responsible for the research, development, testing, release and maintenance of CD and DVD copy protection products and Digital Rights Management (DRM) solutions for the games, music and film industries. Most notably, Mark was the lead developer of the market leading SafeDisc copy protection product for the games industry.

Mark has twenty years experience developing and managing mass distribution software. Prior to Macrovision Mark worked for ten years at Racal Research developing real time, embedded, security and communications solutions for the telecommunications sector.

Mark holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Computing and Information Systems from the University of Manchester.
